txt.en: 'Can you get me another pillow, please? This bed is rather unfomfortable. Thank you.'\n\nWhat a disgrace. You should make sure N贸i gets out of sight before people start getting offended by his public display of drunkenness.
Designated Escort: A Disturbance in Needlehole
A member of the Ale Association seems to have landed drunk in Needlehole, where everyone can see him. Shameful!
Now N贸i can sleep it off without embarrassing his neighbours
You left N贸i to make a fool of himself
At least he is out of sight now.
N贸i is the disgrace of Needlehole.\n\nYou should escort the drunken dwarf to a secluded place where he won't be disturbing the good-mannered folk around town.
Escort the drunken dwarf out of this public place
